comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of packs of ramen eaten by the salesman
- y: number of packs of fries eaten by the salesman

Definitions:
- x \geq 0 (non-negative integer)
- y \geq 0 (non-negative integer)

Constraints:
- Calories constraint: 400x + 300y \geq 3000
- Protein constraint: 20x + 10y \geq 80
- Sodium constraint: 100x + 75y \leq S (where S is the total sodium intake limit)
- Percentage constraint: x \leq 0.3(x+y)

Objective:
- Minimize sodium intake: Minimize 100x + 75y
